content.html: Anna's hummingbirds exceeded all my expectations. Amazing little creatures, full of character that viciously defended their feeding patches against conspecifics. Then, with a twist of the neck, their head became alive with the most incredible colour!
content.value: Anna's hummingbirds exceeded all my expectations. Amazing little creatures, full of character that viciously defended their feeding patches against conspecifics. Then, with a twist of the neck, their head became alive with the most incredible colour!

content.html:
my more controversial take is I LOVE and support ROM hackers and modders & feel strongly that they are legit game devs who deserve hella props for dedication to their craft but i know this one is kind of fiddly

like there's companies like bethesda who also love their modders and will even hire from their modder pool, but then companies like nintendo who despise them üò´

content.html:
Some assholes worshipping a sun god from down south just put up a fort, saying this is the edge of civilization.

They are harrying the lizard-folk in the swamp and have killed a bunch of the cave clans. The delicate peace everyone has worked hard to achieve is falling apart.

They're saying that you all are bandits, sworn to chaos and need to be killed. They've put prices on your heads.

Inspired by: https://www.prismaticwasteland.com/blog/the-keep-on-the-borderlands-is-full-of-lies

#KeepOnTheBorderlands #DnD #DungeonsAndDragons #TTRPG
content.value: Some assholes worshipping a sun god from down south just put up a fort, saying this is the edge of civilization.They are harrying the lizard-folk in the swamp and have killed a bunch of the cave clans. The delicate peace everyone has worked hard to achieve is falling apart.They're saying that you all are bandits, sworn to chaos and need to be killed. They've put prices on your heads.Inspired by: https://www.prismaticwasteland.com/blog/the-keep-on-the-borderlands-is-full-of-lies#KeepOnTheBorderlands #DnD #DungeonsAndDragons #TTRPG

content.html:
Have you heard? #GodotEngine is having a documentation sprint to bring the documentation coverage, and quality, up to the expected standard ahead of #Godot4! üéì

https://godotengine.org/article/godot-4-0-docs-sprint

To get you in the mood we've also updated main sections, renaming and moving things around. The sidebar may also feel a little different, let me know what you think üëÄ

content.html:
üö®üåøGRASS GIF ALERTüåøüö®

In #Techtonica, the grass ~fwooshes~ when you build machines, waves in the cavern breeze, and twirls below the M.O.L.E. (our black hole terrain manipulator).

Not sure we've been this pumped about grass before, but here we are.

content.html:
Traffic is wild out there. ü§£

Up til now, cars would drive in a random direction and every few seconds would turn a random amount. This was chaotic. _This_ is meant to be adding tiles that force the cars to turn corners.

It's not working hahaha. As usual for me though, if it generates good gifs, it's worth pursuing.

#pico8
